page.title: 06A Garage in Sutton.
page.content: At Sutton there are 4 garages and one of the owners is{Mr Shields.}He sells cars and lawnmowers and the most popular car he sells is the Ford.He sells petrol,diesel and derv.Derv stands for diesl engine road vehicle. He sells 98% petrol and 2% diesel.The garage was built in 1957.He enjoys his job.He employs 6 people.He is open 7 days a week but he closes on Christmas Day and Boxing Day. He opens at 8am and closes at 6pm his garage is for sale now.He repairs windscreens and he sells parts for cars and the other things he sells at his garage.
